## Problem1

Read Mt Trash Data set.

```{r}
trashwheel_df =
  readxlsx(".data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-16.xlsx", 
           sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", 
           range= cell_cols("A:N")) %>%
  janitor:: clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
  mutate(
    sport_balls = round(sports_balls), 
    sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)
  )
```
